name: Gendered Toys: An Exploration of Gender Perception
name_original: Gendered Toys: An Exploration of Gender Perception
description: This is a data visualization project based on the MIT study Characteristics of Boys' and Girls' Toys (2005) by Judith E. Owen Blakemore. The interactive visualization allows you to hover over a multitude of toys to see how masculine or feminine the participants in the study believed the toys to be. Additionally, there are many different subcategories to explore.
